parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Conversations

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Register knowledge base database to given person. See [[Conversations]] for more details.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is no longer available in <template><title>arma2</title></template> and <template><title>arma3</title></template>.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbAddDatabase]] fileName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> fileName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_hasBeenAdded = _unit [[kbAddDatabase]] "chat.txt"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbAddTopic]], [[kbHasTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbWasSaid]], [[kbReact]], [[kbRemoveTopic]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
</value></part></template>
